H0.text: The Carnegie family fortune was built around Andrew Carnegie’s success in manufacture in which industry. Coal

H1.text: The Carnegie family fortune was built around Andrew Carnegie’s success in manufacture in which industry. Railroads

H2.text: The Carnegie family fortune was built around Andrew Carnegie’s success in manufacture in which industry. Oil

H3.text: The Carnegie family fortune was built around Andrew Carnegie’s success in manufacture in which industry. Steel

A4.text: Carnegie combined his assets and those of his associates in 1892 with the launching of the Carnegie Steel Company.

A5.text: Carnegie made his fortune in the steel industry, controlling the most extensive integrated iron and steel operations ever owned by an individual in the United States.
